class.name: Phaser.LoaderParser
class.help: Phaser.LoaderParser parses data objects from Phaser.Loader that need more preparation before they can be inserted into the Cache.

public.name: bitmapFont
public.help: Parse a Bitmap Font from an XML file.

parameters.name: game
parameters.help: A reference to the current game.

parameters.name: xml
parameters.help: XML data you want to parse.

parameters.name: cacheKey
parameters.help: The key of the texture this font uses in the cache.

parameters.name: xSpacing
parameters.help: Additional horizontal spacing between the characters.

parameters.name: ySpacing
parameters.help: Additional vertical spacing between the characters.
